opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Campbell v. Carlson (et al., Appellants).
Argued March 19, 1970.
Before Jonhs, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Bernard J. McAuley, with him Wayman, Irvin, Trushel <& McAuley, for appellants.
Nevin Stetler, with him Leonard B. Beeves, Stuart M. Neely, and Stetler <& Qribbin, for appellee.
July 2, 1970:
